page.title: 14SOCIAL SURVEY CONTINUED....
page.content: Of people who had their own transport, most did their shopping in the larger surrounding towns:- 17% in Stafford 17% in Stone ,50% in Stoke {ROAD SURVEY} Everyone agreed that even though the local roads were too narrow they very pleasant.The majority felt that if new Industry was introduced it would spoil the rural atmosphere.They all agreed that improvements could be made to the social community:-more social activities, more clubs for young and old. {THE YOUNGER GENERATION} There are quite a few children under the age of 16 in the area. Although most of those interviewed felt that there was little to do after school hours, none of them found themselves watching television out of boredom.
